1.0.0.name: wordpress/rigreference-solar-conditions-and-hf-propagation
1.0.0.description:
Solar conditions play a crucial role in HF-propagation conditions. RigReference.com has a widget showing the current conditions based on NOAA data. This data can be used by ham radio operators to determine the best time to make long-range communications on shortwave bands (160 to 10 meters). But this widget required you to edit your templates and add a little javascript snippet to them.

With this WordPress widget you can now add the solar widget to your blog easy and simple.
